Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Enywe Abandu mulie bilimushialo abiamwachamilwa ebilayi, ne mulaloonda amaseenelo kashetani tawe, toto ye ni omusuku wenyu owahabulafu
Toto ye abalomesinjia okhukhola amabii nende eshifwabi nende okhuchishila Nyasaye akamulamanyile tawe

Ne nibabilwa mbu “Loonde aka Nyasaye yeshia” baboola mbu; “Efwe khuloonda aka khwanyoola bapapa befu nibalikhwo” Koo kata nikali mbu bapapa babu shibali nibamanya eshindu tawe, nende nibalaali abalunjifu
Ne balia abakhaya bali shinga ulia wayulilanga ulawulila tawe, halali omwoyo butswa nende obuyoka. Ni abatimbe, abasilu, abawofu mana kario shibamanyanga tawe
Eywe abasuubila lie khubindu ebilayi biakhubakabiile ne mupile orio Nyasaye toto nimuba mbu niye butswa owamulaamanga

Toto ye yabakania okhulia ebifwile nende amatsayi nende inyama yeyimbitsi, nende eshiarumbulilwakho ebise bwokhushisinza lilali elira lia Nyasaye, Habula ulia wulilwa nende okhubula shingala akhola, obulali okhwikomba nohombo okhubura eshichelo, awo ye abula tsimbii. Toto Nyasaye ni omulesheli owetsimbabaasi

Toto balia bafisanga ka Nyasaye yeshia okhurula mushitabu, nebakakusinjia ako obukusi obutiti, Abo shibalitsanga mutsinda tsiabu okulali omulilo tawe, ne Nyasaye shalilomaloma ninabo inyanga yeyindukho neshalibatswenula tawe, ne baliba neshinyasio eshilulu
Abo nibo balobola obukori okhushila obulunjifu nende eshinyasio okhushila obulesheli, Koo bali nende manishina akokhwisumilisia mumulilo
Endio niliokhuba mbu Nyasaye yeshia eshitabu khubwatoto, ne toto balia bakabukhanamwo mushitabu bali khubushilani buli ehale muno nende obwatoto
